website_summaries.verdict: Well-made, good-looking, and versatile - this round coffee table has it all. The handsome faux wood surface features a medium brown finish that would pair well with most furniture sets.
pros: Features a spacious, two-tiered design that is attractive and practical
Putting it together isn't too difficult, and it has a sturdy feel once assembled
Metal frame and wood-look tabletop and shelf create rustic charm
cons: Not real wood, but it looks close

customer_reviews.title: It looks like the paneling is glued to particle board
customer_reviews.text: The table looked cheep. It is described as pine, which is not the case. It might be pine paneling, but it is not solid pine. It looks like the paneling is glued to particle board, which you can see between the cracks of the paneling. The item also had a very strong chemical smell. OJ Commerce was not willing to work with me on returning the table until Amazon got involved. They told me that "pine" did not describe the type of wood. They also told me to leave the table outside to deal with the chemical smell. The company was the worst if ever had to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, sturdy table. The legs can be adjusted to account for wobbles. And we got all pieces in the set for about a quarter of what they were selling for in the Ashley store. The set together looks great...coffee table, round end table, nesting tables and the sofa table. The mix of square and round adds a great dimension and they are very versatile. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AKSMD

customer_reviews.title: Not great.........
customer_reviews.text: Really not impressed. The top is covered with weird gouges that seem like they might be intentional but are completely unfinished... so they're just like weird white gouges that stand out and make it obvious that it's just particle board underneath. The whole thing feels pretty cheaply made and not sturdy. Definitely not worth the price. Would send it back if it wasn't such a pain to repackage - and the packaging was totally destroyed during shipping. We will live with it for now and hopefully replace it eventually. 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amber Shinsel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Once we put it together, there are gaps on one side of the table where the wood meets the metal and some of the top layer of the wood is peeling off on one edge of one of the boards. While you can't totally tell unless you look closely, it is pretty cheap quality for what you pay for. If I hadn't waited 10 months to put it together, I totally would have returned it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Dkarena

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly what I was looking for. I saw a similar one at Pottery Barn for $1000+ and fell in love with it. So happy to find this one on Amazon at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Florida shopper

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hard to assemble but I love this table. It fits my decor and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: but it honestly it a nice "knock off" to Pottery Bard version and 1/3rd the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of the varied reviews, but it honestly it a nice "knock off" to Pottery Bard version and 1/3rd the price. Went together very easily despite the shipping box having various holes and dented corners, the product was undamaged and well protected. Saved over $50 from ordering the exact table from Ashley furniture which was even on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey L. Lubas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture! Heavy, strong quality. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hadzor

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is perfect with our U shaped sectional. Everyone can reach it and the shelf under is handy to clear up the top when entertaining!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It is sturdy and was easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is sturdy and was easy to put together. I prices this table at Ashley and it was 599.00. I saved $$$ buying it online.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Hazelwood

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I like the rustic industrial look
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I like the rustic industrial look. I like the smaller bottom shelf. The space between is large enough to put a basket under for a blanket or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Mack

customer_reviews.title: Nice PB knockoff
customer_reviews.text: We fell in love with the pottery barn version but found this one at a fraction of the price. Assembly requires 2 people to hold the tabletop and screw the bolts at the same time. The wood is a laminate and not hardwood. The metal rustic finish is more of a grey-brown ripple paint. Everything is bolted or screwed together and wouldn't be too difficult to "hack" if you are handy and wanted to change the color or wood.
customer_reviews.author: Ken P

customer_reviews.title: Table came quickly in good condition, however the middle shelf screw holes did ...
customer_reviews.text: Table came quickly in good condition, however the middle shelf screw holes did not line up on the frame regardless of the orientation. For the price this seems like a careless oversight.
customer_reviews.author: painter

customer_reviews.title: Generally pleased
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Distressing of wood is a little too regular in its pattern. Overall look we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This piece is sturdy and stylish and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Nartina Casual Round Cocktail Table - Light Brown
product_meta.description: Style Name:Coffee TableYour home is more than a house, it’s the daily moments and experiences you share that make it uniquely you. At Ashley Furniture, we celebrate being home with you. We are passionate about being the best and most affordable furniture providers for your home. Rooms are meant for living and dreaming. Helping you furnish your home inspires us in everything we do. From designing collections and products around the latest trends, to looking for ways to reduce costs.
feature_bullets: RUSTIC-CHIC ROUND COFFEE TABLE: Table features gracefully curved legs and an expansive tabletop with a lower shelf; it's perfect for any casual-cool living room thanks to a rustic mix of metal & wood
SHAPELY METAL FRAME: Manmade wood tabletop and lower shelf finished with distinctive weathered veneers
DISTINCTIVE METAL BASE: Neutral yet rustic antique bronze-tone finish is a perfect match for any living room
CLASSIC ROUND SHAPE: Great for any living room and measures 40" W x 40" D x 18" H
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, hardware and tools included, UL listed power cord included
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars27 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
